xs.$description: input.height.xs — Extra small input height. Use for compact forms.

sm.$description: input.height.sm — Small input height. Use for secondary inputs.

md.$description: input.height.md — Medium input height. DEFAULT for most inputs.

lg.$description: input.height.lg — Large input height. Use for prominent inputs.

xl.$description: input.height.xl — Extra large input height. Use for marketing forms.

xs.$description: input.padding.x.xs — Extra small horizontal padding (8px). Use for compact form inputs.

sm.$description: input.padding.x.sm — Small horizontal padding (12px). Use for secondary form fields.

md.$description: input.padding.x.md — Medium horizontal padding (12px). Use for standard inputs. DEFAULT.

lg.$description: input.padding.x.lg — Large horizontal padding (16px). Use for prominent form fields.

xl.$description: input.padding.x.xl — Extra large horizontal padding (16px). Use for marketing forms.

borderRadius.$description: input.borderRadius — Default input border radius (4px). Use for consistent alignment with buttons.

borderWidth.$description: input.borderWidth — Input border width (1px). Use for subtle borders; focus ring provides emphasis.

xs.$description: input.fontSize.xs — Extra small input font size.

md.$description: input.fontSize.md — Medium input font size. DEFAULT.

xl.$description: input.fontSize.xl — Extra large input font size.

lineHeight.$description: input.lineHeight — Input line height for proper text alignment.

duration.$description: input.transition.duration — Input transition duration for focus/hover states.

ringWidth.$description: input.focus.ringWidth — Focus ring width for inputs.

ringOffset.$description: input.focus.ringOffset — Focus ring offset from input border.
